This is an [R Markdown](http://rmarkdown.rstudio.com) Notebook. When you execute code within the notebook, the results appear beneath the code. 

Try executing this chunk by clicking the *Run* button within the chunk or by placing your cursor inside it and pressing *Ctrl+Shift+Enter*. 

```{r}
#install.packages("maptools")
#install.packages("tidyverse")
#library(tidyverse)
library(maptools)
library(RColorBrewer)
library(classInt)
library(OpenStreetMap)
library(sp)
library(rgeos)
library(sf)
library(rgdal)
library(geojsonio)
library(tmap)
library(tmaptools)
#library(shinyjs)
Liverpool_Lsoa <- read_shape("N:\\GIS\\assessment1\\Liverpool\\e08000012\\E08000012\\shapefiles\\E08000012.shp")
liverpool_osm <- read_osm(Liverpool_Lsoa, type = "esri", zoom = NULL)

qtm(liverpool_osm) +
  tm_shape(Liverpool_Lsoa)+
  tm_polygons("imd_score",
              style="jenks",
              midpoint=NA,
              palette="YlOrBr",
              title="the IMD score") + 
  tm_compass(position = c("right", "top"),type = "arrow") + 
  tm_scale_bar(position = c("center", "bottom")) +
  tm_layout(title = "Liverpool IMD Score", legend.position = c("left", "bottom"))

 
```

Add a new chunk by clicking the *Insert Chunk* button on the toolbar or by pressing *Ctrl+Alt+I*.

When you save the notebook, an HTML file containing the code and output will be saved alongside it (click the *Preview* button or press *Ctrl+Shift+K* to preview the HTML file).

The preview shows you a rendered HTML copy of the contents of the editor. Consequently, unlike *Knit*, *Preview* does not run any R code chunks. Instead, the output of the chunk when it was last run in the editor is displayed.
```{r}

tmap_mode("view")
qtm(liverpool_osm) +
  tm_shape(Liverpool_Lsoa)+
  tm_polygons("imd_score",
              style="jenks",
              midpoint=NA,
              palette="Blues",
              title="the IMD score")
```
